property.name: textFileNamesRegex
property.default: .+\.(cfg | conf | config | ini | properties | props | txt | asp | aspx | htm | html | js | jsf | jsp | xht | xhtml | sql | xml | xsd | xsl | xslt)

type.description: Mongo DB scripts executed on an Mongo DB client

property.name: clientWrapperScript
property.description: The OS-specific wrapper script that calls the Mongo DB client

property.name: address
property.description: The address Mongo DB is running on.

property.name: port
property.description: The port Mongo DB is running on.

property.name: database
property.description: The database the mongo client should connect to.

property.name: bin
property.description: The bin used for the command. By default, 'mongo' is used, means that 'mongo' has to be present in the $PATH. Other value can be an absolute path, i.e /var/lib/mongodb-mms-automation/mongodb-linux-x86_64-3.0.8-ent/bin/mongo.
